casebody.data:
471 A.2d 1054 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. Herbert Philip SUSKIND. Misc. (Subtitle BV) No. 34,

Sept. Term, 1983.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. Dec. 30, 1983.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the consent to disbarment filed by HERBERT PHILIP SUSKIND in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12 d 2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 30th day of December, 1983

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that HERBERT PHILIP SUSKIND be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of HERBERT PHILIP SUSKIND from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
